title: Red Apple Sangria
directions: Fill a large wine glass half-full with ice. Add Cabernet Sauvignon, pineapple juice, cranberry juice, red apple liqueur, lemon-lime soda, and grenadine; stir to mix. Garnish with red apple, orange, lime, and maraschino cherry.
ingredients: 3 fluid ounces pineapple juice (such as Dole)
3 fluid ounces cranberry juice (such as Ocean Spray)
1 1/2 fluid ounces red apple liqueur (such as Shakka)
1 1/2 fluid ounces lemon-lime carbonated beverage (such as 7Up)
1/2 red apple, scooped into balls with a melon baller
